item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: How Things Work #0: ZODA and the Accidental Computer
Today, we explore how Data Availability Sampling (DAS) can scale blockchains with @alexhevans and @GuilleAngeris from @BainCapCrypto.
Turns out, you can (somehow) embed verifiable computations over data in DA into DA ğŸª„.

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: ğŸš¨ We have cut the Foundry v1.0 Release Candidate, and published a migration guide. ğŸš¨
Run `foundryup -i rc` to get the RC binaries and try it out.
It is important to us we get your feedback as this is the last step before the official 1.0 release after three years.
Docs link in thread below.
item.dc:creator: @gakonst
